member.summary: This is the object that can get to different providers and also set their connection strings accordingly.

member.name: T:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.Enums.DefaultLINTAccessLevel
member.summary: Default LINT Access Levels. This is used to map the default settings for different roles when the user was first assigned in the system.

member.name: T:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.Enums.CardAssignmentReason
member.summary: Card Assignment Reason: 1 = Card assigned to the Cast Member the first time 2 = Card reassigned due to card lost 3 = Card reassigned due to card malfunction - no penalty for this type of re-assignment 4 = Card Assigned to Existing Cast Member for the First Time 5 = Change cast member status - no penalty for this type of re-assignment

How frequent the job needs to run

member.summary: Only do the action once

member.name: T:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.LintKeyValuePair`2
member.summary: This class is used to create a list of name and value pair, such as Machine ID / Machine Name or Rail Step ID / Rail Step description

member.name: T:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.LintNameValuePair
member.summary: This class is used to create a list of name and value pair, such as Machine ID / Machine Name or Rail Step ID / Rail Step description

member.name: P:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.LintObjectBase.IsValid
member.summary: This is to test if the object has business rules associated with it. If there are any, by calling this property the object will verify its data to the rules and return a boolean to indicate if this is valid or not. Default is returned "True"
member.value: Boolean value to indicate if the object is valid or not.
member.remarks: Please check the class "BusinessRuleManager" to learn how to apply business rules.

member.name: P:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.LintObjectBase`1.Sort
member.summary: This is to tell how to sort a list of the same object. This property only works if you are only sorting one property at a time

member.name: P:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.LintObjectBase`1.SortBy
member.summary: Property name used to be sorting the elements in the list. Property names are case sensitive. For example "PropertyNameA, PropertyNameB DESC", where PropertyNameA is sorted in ascending order and PropertyNameB in descending order.
member.remarks: This must be the same as the name of the property

member.name: P:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.LintObjectBase`1.Comparer
member.summary: Comparer to make the sorting algorithm work

member.name: M:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.LintObjectBase`1.BeginEdit
member.summary: Start edit of object

member.name: M:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.LintObjectBase`1.CancelEdit
member.summary: Cancel edit of the object

member.name: M:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.LintObjectBase`1.Clone
member.summary: Create a clone of the object with data. This is a deep clone of the object.

member.name: M:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.LintObjectBase`1.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Tell the interface if the object needs to be updated to the database

member.name: M:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.LintObjectBase`1.EndEdit
member.summary: Finish edit of the object

member.name: T:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.SluggishDatabaseConnectionSimulationJobManager
member.summary: This class mimic a sluggish database connection. The default fail delay is 20 seconds, and will be alternating online and offline every 30 seconds.

member.name: T:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.UnreachableDatabaseSimulationJobManager
member.summary: Use this class to mimic database failure.

member.name: P:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Core.UnreachableDatabaseSimulationJobManager.FailDelayInSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the fail delay in seconds. Default is 20 seconds will simulate the failure
